casebody.data:
No. 09-329. Chase Bank USA, N.A., Petitioner v. James A. McCoy, Individually and on Behalf of All Others Similarly Situated. 561 U.S. 1005, 130 S. Ct. 3451,

177 L. Ed. 2d 1054,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 5136. June 21, 2010.

Petition for writ of cer-tiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit granted.

Same case below, 559 F.3d 963.
